# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1000000 to you, and I believe it could greatly enhance your business or personal endeavors. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special price of $900000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding the right buyer who truly appreciates its true worth. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing its potential impact on your endeavors. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
